body.p:
- Sep 02, 2005 jManage is considering moving from Apache 2.0 to LGPL license. Please read more and provide your feedback here.
- Sep 02, 2005 jManage build now uses maven instead of ant. This allows for component based source structure. Please see the modified build guide.
- Aug 10, 2005
jManage 0.5.4 is now available. This release contains some of the feature requests.
See Release Notes for more information.
- Jul 31, 2005 jManage 0.5.3 is now available. Along with some bug fixes, this release adds JMXMP support. It can be downloaded here.
- Jun 22, 2005 jManage 0.5.2 is now available. It can be downloaded here.
- Jun 03, 2005 Do you use CruiseControl? Manage it with jManage 0.5. See how.
